Package com.atakmap.android.routes.routearound

Class RouteAroundRegionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.routes.routearound.RouteAroundRegionManager
  • public class RouteAroundRegionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the state of the list of regions that a routing engine will attempt to route around

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  RouteAroundRegionManager.RegionManagerState
      Data class representing the state of the region manager.
